title: Look inside the $30 million mansion with a private beach where Britney Spears spent Valentineâ€™s Day
text:
Last February, pop icon Britney Spears celebrated Valentine's Day in style. The singer spent the holiday at a secluded Airbnb in Malibu along with her boyfriend Sam Asghari and her two sons, Jayden and Sean.
The home, which is worth a reported $30 million according to People , provided an impeccable backdrop for envy-inducing Instagram posts from Spears. "A touch of heaven," she captioned one video. "No photo can capture the beauty of a family weekend getaway in Malibu," she wrote on another. 

The " Malibu Dream Escape ," as it's described on the listing, doesn't disappoint. It's equipped with all the necessities for a relaxing getaway, including private beach access, an infinity pool and space for 10 guests.
But luxury doesn't come cheap. Although Spears' stay was on the house from Airbnb, the villa typically costs $6,000 a night. 
Let's take a look inside.
The living room features high ceilings, a cozy fireplace and floor to ceiling windows.
Airbnb Sliding glass doors open to the outside, and built in speakers both inside and out allow music to drift across the entire property.
Airbnb The kitchen boasts stainless steel appliances, marble countertops and ample room to cook.
Airbnb The estate has five bedrooms, including a master suite with its own fireplace.
Airbnb When they're not enjoying California's breezy weather, guests can catch a flick in the theater room or get their sweat on in the home gym.
Airbnb Best Nest Living , a company that provides personalized services to travelers in Southern California, is on call 24/7 to answer questions and provide services to guests, including sending personal chef or cleaning service to the residence.
Airbnb In the backyard, guests can relax in the outdoor living room or take a dip in the infinity pool while overlooking the ocean below.
Airbnb The home also offers a mini beach area, which is perfectly secluded.
Airbnb Don't miss: Look inside the Airbnb mansion where Chrissy Teigen and John Legend stayed
